title: How to Reset Your Life
headline: This free online self-improvement course explains how to replace bad habits with good ones to improve your wellbeing.
description: This self-help course explains how to live your life to the fullest. We show you how to declutter and reorganise various aspects of your life, ranging from sleeping habits to time management. We discuss how to rewire your brain by introducing healthy habits into your daily routine. Sign up to learn how to make the most of each day by dropping unhealthy and time-wasting habits and replacing them with meaningful experiences that increase wellbeing.

courseDescription:
This personal development course teaches you how to achieve wellbeing. We explain how to introduce new and healthy habits in many areas of life, from sleep and diet to social media consumption and time management. The first step towards living a better life is to recognise the ‘clutter’ that gets in the way. The second step is to get rid of the clutter, which in this context describes patterns of behaviour more than physical objects, and replace it with rewarding and meaningful habits and routines.

Rewiring the brain isn’t impossible but is no easy task. We suggest a range of new habits you can integrate into your life to appreciate the difference they make. We show you how making small changes can almost immediately give you more energy and free time. The lessons provided by this self-help course help you to notice and enjoy things you haven’t before, like the singing of the birds, the moon and the stars in the night sky, the gentle touch of the grass against your ankles and other small but meaningful moments that stay with you.

Who wouldn’t want to be happier? Who wouldn’t want to have more energy and free time? This course explains how to take action and change your life for the better. These lessons only take four hours and that time can literally change your life. Our modern lives often seem to fly by as we fill them with the clutter of forgettable experiences and unhealthy habits. This self-improvement course explains how to clear that clutter and squeeze the most out of each day.
